name: Fabiform
description:
Navigate a strange cave as you make your escape, but don't let your tether break!

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. Theme: Joined Together

Lead Developer/Programmer: DeliciousSalad

Programmer:  Sam Platek

Sound Design/Music: Niko Kazacos  & Jon Reiner

Art: Elena Lo-McEnaney
